name: locked in a breached base!
description:
this is a remake of scp containment breach. credits to them for giving me the idea!!!

my game is also rlly bad and short

you are a test subject at the scp foundation. while taking a test with one of the various creatures, a containment breach happens and  all the creatures have escaped! try to escape by avoiding the creatures, escaping, an sometimes making friends with some!
